entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 6 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023
